title: Crash-test cockroaches inspire wall-climbing robot
text:
Crash-test cockroaches inspire wall-climbing robot 8:02am EDT - 01:57 
The cockroach's ability to quickly switch from walking on the ground to climbing a wall is helping scientists develop fast-reaction robots able to change direction and climb over obstacles without relying on complex and expensive sensors. Matthew Bell reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The cockroach's ability to quickly switch from walking on the ground to climbing a wall is helping scientists develop fast-reaction robots able to change direction and climb over obstacles without relying on complex and expensive sensors. Matthew Bell reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2q67zrX
